fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Learn an art at the beginning of the game.
- Perform your learned art at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On the first night of the game, you may choose a Town role to learn the art of. You will gain all active abilities of that role, including immunities.
- You cannot learn Town Killing, Town Power, or a unique Town role.
